meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #338.

td.p: Rafael Bernardino, an attorney from La Mirada, California
Donna Marie Wright, an editor from Santa Monica, California
Pamela Norris, a writer from Sandy Springs, Georgia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $7,600)

tr.td: PRESIDENTIAL TRIVIA
NURSERY RHYMES
WORMS
STARTS WITH "C"
FLAGS
ADVERTISING SLOGANS

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Rafael: Who was Abraham Lincoln?)

George Washington

PamelaRafael
')
